TextView.android:text: Follow the steps to reduce the risk.

1. Turn over empty flower pots and buckets, so water does not collect 
 2. Change water in flower pots at least once a week 
 3. Cover tightly containers with water that cannot be emptied 
 4. Cover waste bins when not being used 
 5. Cover widows and outside doors with mosquito netting 
 6. Keep windows/doors closed at sunrise and sunset when mosquitoes most active 
 7. Plant Tulsi near your windows to keep away mosquitoes 
 8. Clear out stagnant water from your property at least once a week 
 9. Clear out unnecessary tires, bottles, coconut shells, waste etc from your compound 
 10. Clear out rain water collecting on porches/balcony/terrace 
 11. Burn camphor at home at sunrise and sunset
